user_query: I'm organizing a World of Warcraft tournament. Provide me with the mythic plus scores by season for my character 'Zadorie' on the Stormrage realm. Also, fetch the latest results from the Aviator game at BET7K to entertain the participants.

TaskList.description: Fetch the mythic plus scores by season for the character 'Zadorie' on the Stormrage realm.
Fetch the latest results from the Aviator game at BET7K.
